selections.name: Fast Captain Shana
selections.reason: Dominant recent speed figure (77) compared to field average. Just missed by a neck last out; clear standout on paper.

selections.name: Fancy Seis
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (62, 61) and should be in the mix for the placings.

selections.name: Jess Rock It
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start with a 51 speed index; rail draw helps in QH sprints.

selections.name: Daddys A Cartel
selections.reason: First time starter from a barn that can pop; watch the tote.

selections.name: Hiclass Famous One
selections.reason: Posted a strong 71 speed index recently (Dec 22), which is superior to this field's recent form.

selections.name: Kams Cartel
selections.reason: Ran a respectable 62 speed index in debut; improvement expected.

selections.name: Sign Fire
selections.reason: Speed figure of 60 fits well here; solid exotic contender.

selections.name: Myka Roon Csj
selections.reason: Speed figure of 54 puts her in the mix for lower rungs of the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Kams Cartel
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced with room to improve past the top pick.

selections.name: She's A One Of One
selections.reason: Significant class drop from CLM8500 to CLM4500. Speed figure of 62 two back dominates this group.

selections.name: Lightsoutscarlett
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a recent 57 speed figure; logical alternative if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Behindthebar
selections.reason: Has back class and a speed figure of 59, but form has been spotty recently.

selections.name: Beyond The Law
selections.reason: Speed figures in the 40s make her a fringe player for the superfecta.

danger_horse.name: Lightsoutscarlett
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who could pick up the pieces if the dropper (#1) isn't ready.

selections.name: Rocky Bay Rae
selections.reason: Last-out speed figure of 91 is a standout. Drops from AOC20000 where she finished 2nd.

selections.name: Ima Margarita Girl
selections.reason: Cutting back to a sprint after an 87 speed figure routing. Dangerous closer.

selections.name: Blue Spirit
selections.reason: Consistent mid-70s to low-80s speed figures. Solid underneath play.

selections.name: Bubbles Up
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a 74 speed figure; steps up in class but in good form.

danger_horse.name: Ima Margarita Girl
danger_horse.reason: High class router cutting back; if the pace is hot, she wins.

selections.name: Pakas Secret
selections.reason: Recent 67 speed figure on Jan 7 is the best current form in a weak field. Finished 3rd ahead of rival #6.

selections.name: Bear Encounter
selections.reason: Ran a 58 in the same race as the top pick; logical second choice.

selections.name: Tomorrownevercomes
selections.reason: Recent 55 speed figure puts him in the mix for the exotics.

selections.name: Levi Gone Wild
selections.reason: Speed figure of 53 is competitive for the minor awards.

selections.name: Ginger In Charge
selections.reason: Top last-out speed figure of 76 (Jan 7). Finished 2nd and looks ready to win.

selections.name: Cocktail Princess
selections.reason: Ran a 73 speed figure on Jan 6; clearly the main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Song Of Shadows
selections.reason: Also ran a 73 recently (Jan 19) but finished 4th; solid contender.

selections.name: Pleasingly
selections.reason: Speed figure of 64 is a step below the top three but best of the rest.

danger_horse.name: Cocktail Princess
danger_horse.reason: Very close on speed figures (73 vs 76); could easily turn the tables.

selections.name: Let Me Help You
selections.reason: Highest recent speed figure (81) on Jan 8. Value play at 6/1.

selections.name: Moonlight Road
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 79 speed figure last out; finished 2nd.

selections.name: K R Rules
selections.reason: Proven dirt form (78 speed in Dec); threat despite recent turf run.

selections.name: Jimmy's Wild Boy
selections.reason: Speed figure of 68 is competitive for the bottom of the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Moonlight Road
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and only 2 points off the top pick's speed figure.

selections.name: Crystal Proof
selections.reason: Most reliable recent form with a 69 speed figure (3rd place finish).

selections.name: Happy Chappy
selections.reason: Ran a 68 in the same race as the top pick; very little separates them.

selections.name: Capital Heat
selections.reason: Had a legitimate excuse last time (lost iron/rider issues); capable of 71 speed.

selections.name: Hot Jammies
selections.reason: Recent 62 speed figure puts her in the hunt for a minor share.

danger_horse.name: Capital Heat
danger_horse.reason: Forgive the last run; previous form (71 speed) wins this race.
